long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension provides an interface for PredictionBook.com that performs automatic client-side encryption of prediction titles before they are stored on the server, providing added security in the event of a server compromise.

Prediction titles are automatically decrypted before being displayed to the user.

Strong encryption is provided by the AES-GCM algorithm, with a user-defined password.
